text: Alan J Windsor (born 1945) is a former English international lawn and indoor bowler. ==Bowls career== ===World Indoor Championships=== He won the bronze medal in the 1980 World Indoor Bowls Championship. His first cap for England was in 1973 (outdoors) and 1974 (indoors). ===Commonwealth Games=== He represented England in the singles, at the 1982 Commonwealth Games in Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. ===National=== He was runner-up in the 1981 National Championships. ==Personal life== By trade he was a school caretaker. ==References== Category:Living people Category:English male bowls players Category:1945 births
title: Alan Windsor
